main event: Many objects were observed drifting earthward over Lake Okeechobee, Florida on 8 March 1955.
interesting points: The observation was made as a ground-visual sighting., The presence of flares in the area was verified by the Maxwell Flight Service Center., R-47 type aircraft were conducting a training mission at the same time of the sighting., The length of the observation is unknown., The sighting involved many objects that were not counted.
